text: Moacyr Claudino Pinto da Silva (born 18 May 1936) is a former Brazilian football player. He has played for Brazil national team. ==Honours== ; Flamengo *Torneio Rio–São Paulo: 1961 ; Peñarol *Uruguayan Primera División: 1962 ; Barcelona de Guayaquil *Ecuadorian Serie A: 1966 ; Brazil *FIFA World Cup: 1958 ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from São Paulo
title: Moacir (footballer, born 1936)
